jmines.control.listeners
Class ActionListenerForDialogs

java.lang.Object
  jmines.control.listeners.ActionListenerForDialogs
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class ActionListenerForDialogs
extends Object
implements ActionListener

The listener to use to listen the actions done on a button.

Author:
Zleurtor
